content.prompt: Students perform an experiment by placing a wire in a magnetic field of magnitude B that is directed to the right. The wire has a current of magnitude I directed toward the bottom of the page. Which of the following correctly describes the change in the force on the wire as the wire is rotated clockwise 90âˆ˜ while staying in the plane of the page?

choices.label: The force goes from a maximum value directed out of the page, remains directed out of the page, and decreases down to zero.
The force goes from a maximum value directed into the page, remains directed into the page, and decreases down to zero.
The force goes from zero, increase and is directed out of the page, and reaches a maximum value directed out of the page.
The force goes from a maximum value directed out of the page, decreases to zero, and then increases to a maximum value directed into the page.
The force goes from a maximum value directed into the page, decreases to zero, and then increases to a maximum value directed out of the page.
